objects.specification: A broad flat classroom floor with a neutral light grey finish and smooth matte surface, providing a uniform and durable ground plane suitable for a learning environment with minimal visual distraction.
A tall classroom wall painted in a soft neutral tone with subtle dinosaur-themed decals integrated into the smooth plaster surface, minimal trim, and a clean, modern appearance.

A large rectangular teacher's desk crafted from a darker wood tone with a polished matte finish, featuring sturdy square legs, a modesty panel, slight beveled edges, and a rich wood grain texture for an authoritative focal point.
An ergonomic teacher chair with a padded seat and back upholstered in a complementary muted fabric, supported by dark wooden legs, featuring a contoured shape and supportive backrest for comfort.
A standard student desk in a light wood tone with a smooth matte finish, rectangular top supported by slender metal legs, featuring minimalistic design and modest proportions.

A large rectangular blackboard with a smooth matte dark green surface and a thin wooden frame, designed for wall mounting, featuring minimal glare and a classic educational look.
A compact ceiling-mounted projector with a white plastic casing, rectangular form factor, ventilation grilles, and a prominent front lens, designed to provide clear image projection onto the board.

A large realistic dinosaur model with lifelike textured scales and musculature, painted in earthy green and brown tones with subtle pattern variation, showing detailed claws, ridges, and anatomical accuracy.

A rectangular glass display case with transparent panels and a slim metal frame, featuring a minimalist base and top enclosure to showcase fossil specimens clearly and securely.

A tall wooden bookshelf in a dark wood tone with multiple evenly spaced shelves, filled with dinosaur-related books of varying sizes, neatly arranged with visible spines and labels.
A circular wall clock with a slim metallic frame, crisp white face, bold black numerals and slender hands, featuring a minimalist and modern design for clear time reading.
A floor-standing potted plant with lush green foliage and slender elongated leaves, housed in a decorative ceramic pot with a subtle glazed finish for a natural accent.
